title: Slender: The Asylum v2.1 [PD]
description:
Slender: The Asylum is a Brand New Slenderman Experience based off of the character from the original folklore. Do you have what it takes to escape the Asylum? 

Only time will tell... Slender: The Asylum combines High Quality graphics with a terrifying atmosphere providing you with the Best Slenderman experience available on the Play Store. 

We plan to constantly update this app with any fixes necessary, along with eventually providing our users with additional levels. If you encounters any problems while playing Slender: The Asylum please feel free to send us and email and we will get on top of it right away.

What's New:

Update #1
- Implemented New Player Walking Sounds
- Implemented New Slenderman Animations
- Removed Unnecessary Phone Requirements
- Improved Player's Sounds
- Improved Lighting
- Fixed Various Bugs
Update #2
- Player Now Respawns in Current Level Upon Death
- Various Bug Fixes
